title: The Chopping Block: Are Layer 2s Stealing Ethereum's Thunder? - Unchained - Unchained
summary:
In this episode of "The Chopping Block," crypto insiders discuss the growing popularity of Ethereum Layer 2s (L2s) and their impact on the Ethereum ecosystem. Topics include:

* How much L2s are spending to post data to Ethereum
* Whether L2s are sucking up all the value of ETH
* The challenge of providing a good user experience across multiple rollups
* How the underlying technology of security is not improving but attackers are getting more sophisticated
* Whether centralized lending in the industry is dead
* Why crypto users still hold stablecoins that yield much lower than Treasury bills
* The new approach to bringing real-world assets and tokenized yields to blockchains
* Whether all L2s are running via proof of authority
* Whether alternative Layer 1s are dead or more important than ETH L2s

Hosts include Haseeb Qureshi, Robert Leshner, Tarun Chitra, and Tom Schmidt. Links to Hildebert's charts are provided for further reference.

title: Ethereum (ETH) Rival Solana (SOL) Rolls Out New Carbon Emissions Dashboard To Track Environmental Footprint - The Daily Hodl
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Solana (SOL) has launched a carbon emissions tracker to measure its environmental impact. The tracker was developed in partnership with Trycarbonara and embeds software on Solana nodes for real-time emissions measurement. The data portal includes comparison charts to show the equivalent emissions of Solana transactions. SOL is down 2.5% in the past 24 hours, trading at $21.33.

title: Tether Mints 1 Billion USDT on the Ethereum Network - Coinfomania
summary: Tether, a leading stablecoin issuer, minted 1 billion USDT on the Ethereum network as Bitcoin dropped below $28,000. The company's CTO, Paolo Ardoino, confirmed the mint for inventory replenishment and chain swaps. USDT dominates the Ethereum network with over 35 billion tokens, followed by USDC with nearly 30 billion. Tether's balance sheet posted a $700 million profit in Q1, and its CTO claims USDT is the safest asset to hold. Tether's dominance extends to other chains, with over 81.5 billion dollar-pegged tokens. A BDC Consulting report suggests that Tether's supply correlates with Bitcoin's price, and a depeg could lead to a crash in crypto assets.

title: SafeMoon hacker agrees to return 80% of stolen funds: Finance Redefined - Cointelegraph
summary:
Here is a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

SafeMoon hacker agrees to return 80% of stolen funds, worth $8.9 million. BlockFi, a US crypto lender, was granted an extra 48-day extension to submit its exit plan, exploring asset sales or restructuring. Ether (ETH) price hit an 11-month high, with post-Shapella withdrawals peaking at over 1 million ETH. A subway-themed trading bot made millions using "sandwich" attacks on memecoins. DeFi's total market value plunged by $4 billion, with most top 100 tokens trading in the red.

title: Bitcoin and Ethereum won't make you a millionaire, but AI crypto certainly can - Analytics Insight
summary:
Sure, here is a summary of the article in 256 tokens or less:

Bitcoin and Ethereum may not be the best investment options for quick profits due to their volatility. AI crypto, such as Avorak, is gaining attention as a potentially lucrative investment opportunity. Avorak provides incentives for holding its token and has a revenue model that creates a passive income. Investing in AI crypto could bring gains similar to buying early into Bitcoin and Ethereum. The article suggests that investing in Avorak could be a good opportunity, but it is important to do thorough research before investing.

title: Alt Season is Here: Why Dogetti, Ethereum, and Dogecoin Could be Key Players in 2023's Crypto Rollercoaster - Analytics Insight
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Alt season is approaching, and analysts predict that altcoins will take a larger share of the market, leading to a price rally. Three altcoins to watch are Dogetti (DETI), Ethereum (ETH), and Dogecoin (DOGE). Dogetti is a newcomer with a unique blend of charity donations and token redistribution. Ethereum recently upgraded to a proof of stake system, which could lead to increased demand for the coin. Dogecoin has seen admirable gains and could be an alternative to Bitcoin. Investors are gearing up to find the coins with the most potential rewards. Links to Dogetti's presale and website are provided.
